Method Detail

setFontColor

void setFontColor(int nFontColor)
set font color.

Parameters:
nFontColor - the font color for text

setFontOpacity

void setFontOpacity(int nAlpha)
set font color opacity rate.

Parameters:
nAlpha - the font color opacity rate, it is between 0 and 100, 0 is transparent, 100 is opacity

setFontSizeScale

void setFontSizeScale(int nFontSize)
set font size scale.

Parameters:
nFontSize - the font size scale for text, the parameter value is between 50 and 200, 50 is the smallest and is the 0.5 times of default font size, 200 is the biggest font and is the 2.0 times of default font size.

setBackgroundColor

void setBackgroundColor(int nBackgroundColor)
set text background color.

Parameters:
nBackgroundColor - the background color for text

setBackgroundOpacity

void setBackgroundOpacity(int nAlpha)
set background color opacity rate.

Parameters:
nAlpha - the background color opacity rate, it is between 0 and 100, 0 is transparent, 100 is opacity

setWindowColor

void setWindowColor(int nBackgroundColor)
set window color.

Parameters:
nBackgroundColor - the window color for text

setWindowOpacity

void setWindowOpacity(int nAlpha)
set window background color opacity rate.

Parameters:
nAlpha - the window background color opacity rate, it is between 0 and 100, 0 is transparent, 100 is opacity

setFontItalic

void setFontItalic(boolean nFontItalic)
set font as italic or not.

Parameters:
nFontItalic - if it is true, the font will be italic

setFontBold

void setFontBold(boolean nBold)
set font as bold or not.

Parameters:
nBold - if it is true, the font will be bold

setFontUnderline

void setFontUnderline(boolean nFontUnderline)
set font as underline or not.

Parameters:
nFontUnderline - if it is true, the font will be underline

setFontName

void setFontName(java.lang.String strFontName)
set font name.

Parameters:
strFontName - the font name for text

setFontStyle

void setFontStyle(int style)
set font style, same as setFontName.

Parameters:
style - the font style for text, style is value of below:
  • VOOSMP_FontStyle_Default
  • VOOSMP_Monospaced_with_serifs
  • VOOSMP_FontStyle_Default_Proportionally_spaced_with_serifs
  • VOOSMP_FontStyle_Default_Monospaced_without_serifs
  • VOOSMP_FontStyle_Default_Proportionally_spaced_without_serifs
  • VOOSMP_FontStyle_Default_Casual
  • VOOSMP_FontStyle_Default_Cursive
  • VOOSMP_FontStyle_Default_Small_capitals

    • setEdgeType

    void setEdgeType(int edgeType)
    set the edge type of font.

    Parameters:
    edgeType - the edge type of font, 0:NONE,1:RAISED,2:DEPRESSED,3:UNIFORM,4:LEFT_DROP_SHADOW,5:RIGHT_DROP_SHADOW

    setEdgeColor

    void setEdgeColor(int edgeColor)
    set font edge color.

    Parameters:
    edgeColor - the font edge color for text

    setEdgeOpacity

    void setEdgeOpacity(int nAlpha)
    set edge color opacity rate.

    Parameters:
    nAlpha - the edge color opacity rate, it is between 0 and 100, 0 is transparent, 100 is opacity

    reset

    void reset()
    Reset all parameters to default status. Subtitle will be presented as subtitle stream specified, instead of user specified
